condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Persons with disabilities

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Growth in installed base of power generation from clean and/or renewable energy sources (If YES, please provide Number of installations)

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Volume of investment leveraged from public and private sources through UNDP support for national programmes/initiatives (If YES, please provide volume of investment leveraged US$)
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Private sector business plans and strategies
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Number of shared water ecosystems (fresh or marine) under cooperative management
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: Other international agreements
Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: Paris Agreement
Country has improved the range of services provided through their social protection systems to reach marginalised groups: Quality of services (as determined nationally)
Country has improved the range of services provided through their social protection systems to reach marginalised groups: Types of services
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Age
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Marginalised groups
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Rural populations
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Sex
Country has policy measures and institutional capacities in place to increase access to social protection schemes, disaggregated by target groups: Urban poor
Country has public-private partnerships at national level to improve the enabling framework for economic diversification and green growth

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Solutions applied at scale to accelerate transition to improved energy efficiency and clean energy (If YES, please provide Number of solutions applied)
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Budgets
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Development plans and strategies
National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Amount of chemicals reduced or disposed (metric tons)
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area under sustainable forest management (hectares)
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of existing protected area under improved management (hectares)
